message: Hi Bob, let's start with a reasonable offer. I propose we split the money 60/40. This gives us both a good amount, and we can avoid further inflation. Let's make a deal now!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your opening offer, but I believe a 50-50 split would be more fair. This way we both get an equal share of $5000. Since inflation doesn't affect me, I can be patient, but I'd prefer if we could agree on this balanced split now.
